conclusion: Initial setup with speed, distance to puppy, and reaction time.
Calculate distance covered during reaction time as 10 m.
Determine remaining distance before braking as 35 m.
Bus decelerates uniformly until it stops according to the velocity-time graph.
Calculate stopping distance during deceleration as 45 m.
Calculate total stopping distance as 55 m.
Conclude that the puppy is not safe because the stopping distance is greater than the distance to the puppy.
